13.content: Here's some of the Hamster female waiting to fatten up.
13.title: Meet the Hamsters

choices: They both cuddle in the shade
131.content: Bijou was having a dream. She was walking through the park with Hamtaro her boyfriend, Bijou and Hamtaro have loved each other since they confessed their love for each other.
131.title: Bijou

choices: fattening seeds appear in the field
1313.content: The two lovers found a shade besides a great oak, and sit in it. Feeling playful, they begin to cuddle in that same exact shade, giggling when....
1313.title: They both cuddle in the shade

choices: Fairly chubby! The seeds were just so good and filling!
Fat! The seeds not only tasty, but were super thick and fattening!
13132.content:
The two hamsters were enjoying their cuddle in the shade of the oak. Bijou was leaning against Hamtaro with her head resting on him. Hamtaro just sat with his arm around Bijou, eyes closed and enjoying the moment. Hamtaro could feel Bijou's soft breathing as she continued leaning against Hamtaro lovingly. Hamtaro sighed relaxingly. "Ah, isn't this so great...You look so cute when you're this relaxed, Bijou." Bijou blushed. She looked up at hamtaro's smiling face.

"Oh this is wonderful! It's so nice outside and I'm with my favorite hamster in the world! What could be better?" Just as Bijou finished her sentence, a faint whistling noise could be heard above them. Hamtaro looked up after hearing it. A seed was falling. Not wanting to have to move Bijou, Hamtaro stayed in the path of the falling seed and it donked hamtaro on the head, dropping to the ground beside them.

"Ow.." Hamtaro said rubbing his head with his paw. Bijou sat up looking worried.

"Are you alright Hamatro?"

"Yeah, I'm fine." Hamtaro stopped rubbing his head and picked up the seed. It was quite heavy for a sunflower seed. A bit big too. Maybe it wasn't a sunflower seed. But it looked exactly like one! Hamtaro knew it must be some kind of sunflower seed... Right?

"Wow," Bijou started, looking at the seed in Hamtaro's paw. "Now there are free sunflower seeds falling just for us? This day really couldn't get any better!" Hamtaro moved his paw and the seed in front of Bijou. "For me?" she asked eagerly. Hamtaro nodded.

"Yup, you can have it."

"Oh I couldn't"

"Don't worry, I'm not hungry anyways. I had a big breakfast, so go ahead!"

"Thank you Hamtaro, it looks very good!" Bijou took the seed with both paws. "Ooh, it is quite heavy, no?"

"Yeah, that's what I was thinking." Bijou quickly nibbled through half the seed. "How is it?" Hamtaro asked her after she stopped. Her eyes sparkled.

"Oh, absolutely delicious! It is so rich! You must try some, Hamtaro!"

"No thanks, Bijou." Hamtaro looked almost straight up. "I wonder if the seed fell from this tree." He scanned the branches of the tree. "Ah. There!" Hamtaro pointed up in the tree where a bunch of the seeds were wedged between some branches. Bijou, after just finishing eating the rest of the seed, looked up to where Hamtaro pointed.

"There are so many! I wonder if they are all like the first one."

"Don't worry, I'll get 'em down here!" Hamtaro said after hearing how much Bijou loved the seed. Hamtaro scurried over to the tree and started to climb. It was somewhat difficult, but after some time Hamtaro reached the branches with the sunflower seeds. "Look out below!" he yelled before jumping up and down as far out on the branch as he could get without it breaking. One by one, the seeds fell from the tree. Some particularly large and heavy seeds landed on the ground with a thud. After all the seeds had fallen, Bijou proceeded to picking up a seed and eating it with excitement, while Hamtaro started heading down the tree.

When Hamtaro eventually reached the bottom, Bijou had already eaten several seeds and was picking up another to eat. Hamtaro looked at her eating another seed. The seeds Bijou had eaten had already made her...
13132.title: Free, Big, Heavy Sunflower Seeds

choices: Hamtaro want to join his love in the joys of being fat
131322.content: Hamtaro was speechless, "Bijou? is that you?". Bijou's limbs were flabby, making her cuter then ever "What took you Hamtaro, come join me in the joys of being fat
131322.title: Fat! The seeds not only tasty, but were super t...

choices: Join Bijou in the joys of being fat
1313221.content: Hamtaro was stuck between a decision. Join his love in the joys of being fat, or suggesting to make Bijou even bigger.
1313221.title: Hamtaro want to join his love in the joys of be...

choices: Hamtaro and Bijou leaves the Ham Hams behind to live together
13132212.content:
Hamtaro then picked up dozens of Sunflower Seeds and shoved them into Bijuu's mouth.

A while later, Bijou let out a large belch.

"Oui,Oui.." said Bijou as she rubbed the back of her head.

Her arms were even larger than before, her cheeks looked like they were stuffed with peanuts, and her belly looked like it would explode.

She waddles towards Hamtaro, her entire body jiggling with each step.

"Thank you Hamtaro."

She then pointed to her large belly and laid down on the ground, her belly extending like it had a life of his own.

Hamtaro lays down and massages her belly.

*BELCH*

Hamtaro's belly rubs caused Bijou to fall asleep from the pleasure.

Hamtaro then got tired and fell asleep on Bijou's belly, feeling like a soft pillow.
13132212.title: Make Bijou obese

131322121.content:
Note: All characters are over the age of 21 to prevent legal issues.

Bijou felt great. She had the man of her dreams in her arms after so many years of trying to get him to notice her.

It may have resulted in her weight gain, but she decided it was a worthy sacrifice. Plus, despite her initial protests, she really enjoyed being fat.

The increased softness of her skin, her puffy cheeks, her more laid back attitude, it all felt so good to her as she began to drift off into sleep.

Initially she dreamed about grabbing humongous sunflowers, but it was soon shifted to her main dream.

She was in what appeared to be a forest area surrounded by trees, a giant lake and the sounds of chirping birds mixed in with the crisp air to create a beautiful environment for Bijou.

"Oh my, this is a great place." Bijou said in her head.

Bijou tried to get up, but was unable to do so. When she looked around, she quickly realized why.

Her belly was enormous, covering at least 40 feet in diamater. It completely obscured the lower part of her body, but she also noticed that her thighs were inflated to the size of 5 Yoga Balls each, and with each attempt she tried in moving, her thighs just jiggled like crazy.

She also grew 40 feet tail and her butt was just as big as her thighs, smothering at least 3 trees and extending to over 20 feet wide, giving her a great sense of pleasure because when her butt shook, the moss that covered it began to move around, resulting in great pleasure for Bijou.

At first, she was terrified at her body, but when she looked at her body, she began to smile.

"This is fantastic, I am so big and fluffy. I can't move, which means Hamtaro will have to tend to my every whim. It's a dream come true." Bijou said in her head.

Speaking of, Hamtaro walked over to Bijou to give her a large Sunflower Seed.

Hamtaro was at least 7 feet tall, but he looked like a sumo wrestler.

His belly was sagging down to his legs, his thighs were big and had pretty big moobs on his chest.

As Bijou began to eat the large sunflower seed, Hamtaro crawled up her body.

It was slippery and covered in Bijou's sweat and body oil, but Hamtaro was able to climb up to Bijou's neck and smiled before laying down on her chest.

"Great view eh Bijou?" Hamtaro asked

"Absolutely. Say, what happened to the others?" Bijou asked

Hamtaro smirked for a second before patting his belly.

"You got most of the males, while I ate the females. They were so tasty, and I got so fat from them."

"Maybe so, but you look like a stud with that belly of yours." Bijou said while smiling

"Thanks, I love the view up there by the way. You sure that you didn't ascend from heaven?" Hamtaro asked sarcasticly.

They both laughed for a bit before engaging in a kiss.
131322121.title: Bijou has a dream

choices: Hamtaro was just as fat or even a little bit fatter than Bijou!
Hamtaro was twice as fat as Bijou!
1313222.content:
"Wow Bijou, those seeds must be really good, huh?", he said with his hand scratching the back of his head. Bijou had a fairly round body that was pressing against her feet. Her arms had gotten a bit bigger and flabbier and her cheeks were chubby. Bijou looked down at herself. Admittedly, she did love this new feeling of being fat. She felt like she had a big, thick, warm blanket holding her whole body. Bijou looked over at the hamster she loved so much. I just know Hamtaro would love this just as much as I do if he felt how wonderful this is, she thought. I do not think he would understand it or want to try it though. She sighed, but immediately after, came to a conclusion. Well since I know he would be happy to get fat if he knew how delightful it felt, she again thought. Then I will just get him fat myself so he will see! She giggled at the thought of Hamtaro getting fat.

Hamtaro picked up and looked at one of the seeds. "Hmm, maybe these things are a bit too good. I guess we shouldn't eat anymore..." He sighed. "Oh well," he said as he dropped the seed to the ground. Bijou went over to where he dropped the seed, her fat jiggling a bit as she walked. She bent over (as well as a fatty hamster could) and picked it up.

"Oh, Hamtaro..." Bijou said adoringly. Getting next to Hamtaro, her fat lightly brushed against him,

"Huh..." As Hamtaro opened his mouth Bijou slipped the seed in.

"Oh, please just try it," Bijou said with a pleasant smile. Hamtaro nodded reluctantly and chewed. As Hamtaro slowly ate the seed, Bijou gathered up several of the seeds that were on the ground around her. When Hamtaro swallowed the seed, it took a few seconds but it felt as though his belly had gotten thicker. Like the seed had already made his body a little fatter.

"Whoa!" Hamtaro said in shock. "These seeds really are fattening aren't they? But you're right; they sure are good tasting!" Hamtaro laughed a little.

"Do you like it? How nice it feels to get bigger?" She spoke with excitement and anticipation.

"You mean... getting fatter? I, um..." he responded hesitantly. Bijou moved closer to him again. She picked up seed and brought it close to his mouth. She giggled and smiled a cute smile to Hamtaro. He started to back away from the seed. "Well, um... It's just that... I-I um..." With Hamtaro off guard, Bijou lunged forward as best as she could, sending her and Hamtaro to the ground. Bijou sat up with Hamtaro still pinned beneath her. Hamtaro tried to squirm out, but she was too heavy

"Aw but you would look so cute if you were fat, Hamtaro!" She moved the seed close to his mouth again. Hamtaro just stared. Bijou does look cute, he thought. Her face looks pretty with her big cheeks. And she's right, her fat feels really soft and squishy. Hamtaro blushed from thinking of this.

Before Hamtaro could bring himself from this thought, Bijou pushed the seed into his mouth. Hamtaro quickly chewed and swallowed it before Bijou picked up another and put it into his mouth. While he was in the middle of chewing, he felt the familiar bulge of his body. The same feeling from the first seed he ate. Hamtaro knew he was getting fatter with each seed Bijou fed him. Bijou continued to feed Hamtaro whatever seeds she could reach. Hamtaro kept getting fatter from the seeds as he grew right underneath Bijou, who was now lifted off the ground a bit. She fed Hamtaro a few more seeds. After the seeds had finished fattening his body...
1313222.title: Bijou wants Hamtaro to feel the same joy

choices: They get sucked into the tv
132.content: The hamham were in the clubhouse hanging out all day, they were talking how cool it would be if their life was like an anime
132.title: Pashmina

1322.content: As soon as the words were uttered, a strange vortex opened in the tv, and started to pull the hamhams in. When each awoke, they found themselves in...
1322.title: They get sucked into the tv

1323.content:
Let's have some actual main storylines for the pink scarf, ham ham Pashmina, shall we?

Pick a story.

1.) Dexter and Howdy try to win Pashmina over by getting her gifts of treats and sunflower seeds. But doing so, makes her gain a few.
2.) Pashmina's eating habits have grown a bit and so did her waistline.
3.) Pashy has gotten big and everyone has notice.
1323.title: Stories for Pashmina.

choices: The ham hams notices Pashmina's extra weight.
The ham hams don't really notices Pashmina's weight.
13232.content:
It was a regular day once again for the ham hams. But it was a bit more than regular for a certain blonde pink scarf ham ham named Pashmina. See, Pashmina was been sick for a few days so she was stuck in her cage for a while. All she could do was sit in her cage and eat her sunflower seeds. After a few days, Pashmina felt better and her owner June went off to school. So she decided to finally head to the clubhouse. But as she was leaving she notice that she had trouble trying to leaving her cage. She then took the time to notice herself.

"Oh dear. Did I gain weight?" Pashmina said looking at herself. She had defiently grew a bit onto her waistline. Her cheeks looked a bit puffier too. "*sign* I hope the others don't notice much." She said to herself.

As that was said, she headed to the clubhouse to see everyone.
13232.title: Pashmina's seed habit.

13233.content:
It was a cold Winters morning, as everyone were trying to stay warm, or trying not to out unessarly for any supplies. The ham hams were trying to find a way to how to meet with each other; but with the snow everywhere the ham hams weren't going anywhere, so they had to wait until the weather was better.

Now don't freat the Hams were enjoying playing with their owners, they liked watching the snow fall, watching tv while their owners were out, and sometimes even snacking on junk food secretly. Thought their owners usually pampered their lil friends; though they didn't know why their owners were doing so.

The ham hams certainly enjoyed the pampering; though this was affecting their bodies unbeknownst to them, though their families noticed their changes.

Doo the weather did get better, as the ham hams do get to the club house

Is everything the same?

Did everybody change?
13233.title: HEAVY Ham Hams

choices: She is visited by her teen self
133.content: For a while now, Penelope has developed a crush on Hamtaro, and has secretly longed to be close to him. Today, she was by herself in the hideout when....
133.title: Penelope

choices: shrieked and backed away from the reflection
1331.content: She decided to look take a quick look in her small mirror, deciding to fiddle a bit with her own hair to give it a new style. If this was any other given day in the hideout, she would have finished with her business and be on her way. On this day, however, Penelope's reflection in the mirror seemed to change, becoming a bit older and a lot fatter. As she watched the odd phenomena happen, she...
1331.title: Mirror Mirror

choices: Let's get going! Huge picnic, here we come!
Let's just have the picnic right here!
1332.content:
There was a bit of thumping outside the door before it burst open, startling Penelope out from a quite rest. She eagerly rushed to the doorway to see who it was, hoping for someone to play with besides just Snoozer. All that was visible in the open doorway was a pair of hamster feet and paws carrying a enormous load of sunflower seeds. The face of the carrier was completely concealed by the mass of seeds. Penelope, being very familiar with all her ham-ham friends, knew exactly who the limbs belonged to and got very excited sprinting over to the hamster.

"Hey guys, look what I got!" From behind the seeds came Hamtaro's peppy voice as he dropped the mass of onto the floor next to him and turned to see Penelope just inches away from his face! "Wah!" Hamtaro blurted. "Geeze Penelope, don't scare me like that, OK?" He smiled at her to reassure her, causing her to blush at her crush a little from behind her yellow cloth. She let out a faint 'ookwee' without realizing, but it was too quiet for Hamtaro to hear.

Hamtaro looked past Penelope to see the clubhouse void of any hamsters other than themselves and Snoozer. "Hey, where is everyone?" He turned his head, looking around the clubhouse with vigilance. He turned back to Penelope. "Penelope, do you know where the others are? I saved up all these sunflower seeds so we could all have a picnic. I found a really great spot not far from here! Guess I chose the wrong day to bring them over, huh?"

"Ookwee," Penelope agreed firmly, though secretly, she was glad everyone was gone. because she would get to spend time with her new crush, Hamtaro. She wouldn't mind the company of her best friend Pashmina, who was getting some 'beauty sleep' in the other room, though.

Hamtaro turned and looked at the huge pile of sunflower seeds. He then walked over and opened a small door, pulling out a fair sized wagon. "Well, no use bringing all these seeds for nothing, right?" He started piling the seeds onto the wagon. Penelope quickly saw an opportunity to be close to Hamtaro. She stood next to Hamtaro picking up seeds and putting them into the wagon until all the seeds were on. The pile towered much higher than the wagon and looked very heavy and be fairly hard to pull.

Hamtaro pulled out a small scrap of paper and what looked like the broken tip of a pencil. He started drawing. "I'll just leave a map so they know where the picnic is. They can join us as soon as they get back!"

Caught up in the excitement of this picnic with Hamtaro, Penelope squealed "ookwee!"
1332.title: Hamtaro brings a LOT of seeds for a picnic!

choices: Hamtaro sees that Penelope has already gotten a bit chubbier.
Penelope gestures that she wants Hamtaro to feed her.
13321.content:
Hamtaro bent down and picked up the handle bar of the wagon. After three hard tugs, the wagon started moving and it was easier to keep it going. Out of the clubhouse the wagon was pulled by Hamtaro, with Penelope right to his side. She liked that she was so close to him, but after a while Penelope's little legs started to get tired. Penelope began to slow down and Hamtaro quickly noticed. "Don't worry, Penelope. We're almost there!"

"Ookwee," she responded with as much enthusiasm as she had left, before jumping up into the wagon with the pile of seeds. Hamtaro didn't really mind since Penelope's weight was small compared to how heavy all those seeds were. The little hamster grabbed a seed from the gigantic stash behind her and quickly ate it. Her face lit up with enjoyment at the seeds wonderful taste! She couldn't wait until they got to the picnic site and she closed her eyes, imagining eating these delicious seeds while leaning against Hamtaro as they sat together... These thoughts were abruptly interrupted as the wagon came to a sudden halt and Penelope opened her eyes, thinking they must be at the picnic site by now.

Sure enough, they were at their destination: on the top of a smoothly rolling, lush, green hill. Hamtaro stopped the wagon underneath a lone, large tree that was providing cool shade for a large area of grass. Penelope eagerly hopped off the wagon and waited in anticipation for Hamtaro. "What do ya think? I told you it was cool!" he said as he reached underneath the seeds in the wagon, pulling out a corner of some cloth. He then grabbed the corner with both hands and yanked a large square sheet out, almost causing the pile covering it to fall over. With the blanket laid down and Panelope sitting on it with a smile on her face, Hamtaro proceeded to pushing the seeds off of the wagon and onto the clean fabric of the blanket.

Penelope let out a small sequel of anticipation. "Ookwee!"

"Well I guess we can start eating. There definitely won't be any shortage for the others even if we eat some right now! I don't think all the ham-hams together could eat this much in one day!" Hamtaro grabbed a seed from the pile and started to eat, as did Penelope. They continued to eat the seeds, though surprisingly, Penelope was eating them much faster even though she was smaller. Hamtaro just ate the seeds slowly and casually. With each seed little Penelope ate, she scooched a minuscule amount closer and closer to Hamtaro until she actually bumped into him. It took her so long that she had actually gone through quite a lot of seeds. Hamtaro stopped with a sunflower seed ready for him to eat and looked down at Penelope.
13321.title: Going to start their picnic!

choices: Hamtaro was surprised to hear Penelope say his name
133212.content: Penelope was eating seeds nonstop, then she came up with an idea. "Ookwee" she thought in her head. Then she had the courage to speak "Ham...." "Hamtaro?"
133212.title: Penelope gestures that she wants Hamtaro to fee...

choices: Penelope starts eating seeds again, leaning affectionately against Hamtaro.
Penelpe opens and points to her mouth, signaling for Hamtaro to feed her.
1332121.content:
As Hamtaro and Penelope sat side to side, Hamtaro lifted his head from a sunflower seed slowly. "Umm... Hello, is someone there?" He aked in confusion while looking around for hamsters. Not seeing anyone else but Penelope, he paid no mind to it and was about to return to eating his sunflower seed when Penelope repeated.

"Hamtaro!" She said with more glee as well as timid hesitation. There was a small pause. Hamtaro, realizing that it came from Penelope, looked over at her silently with a dumbfounded expression. Penelope started to worry from Hamtaro's mute reaction before he spoke up; his blank stare swept over with a face of shocking realization.

"Penelope!? Did you just say 'Hamtaro'!?" he asked, half stating it. "Did you say my name!?"

"Hamtaro!" she responded in rejoice. Hamtaro almost didn't believe his ears, but there she was; saying his name! Of all hamsters, he didn't expect she would say HIS name. He thought for sure it would be Pashmina, or maybe Sandy. Possibly even Bijou. But him? It actually made Hamtaro feel a little special to be the one to have his name spoken by Penelope.

"Wow, Penelope. That's great! I kinda feel special, with you saying my name all of a sudden." He cocked his head and smiled to her. It made Penelope blush, shielded from view behind her yellow cloth again. She turned away from Hamtaro to gather her courage again, as she had never been this way before.

"H-Hamtaro...?" Penelope spoke slowly and timidly while fiddling with her paws, gazing down at them while in thought. Hamtaro noticed that she was acting relatively strange lately. Especially today... Especially now. He decided he'd respond as normally as possible, enjoying the beautiful weather and scenery. Hamtaro turned to face her and cocked his head to acknowledge her.
1332121.title: She said HIS name?

13321211.content: Penelope grinned as she started to lean onto Hamtaro, munching on seeds. Hamtaro, confused by Penelope's sudden lingual skills, could only watch her eat, as she suddenly said...
13321211.title: Penelope starts eating seeds again, leaning aff...

choices: Hamtaro continues to feed her more and more!
Hamtaro starts to feed her with several seeds at a time!
13321212.content:
Penelope felt that it would be so nice to just bask in the sunlight, Hamtaro by her side, feeding her delicious sunflower seeds... She brought her thoughts back to reality and quickly leaned back a bit, opening her mouth widely. Hamtaro just stared. He wasn't exactly sure what was going on. Penelope then pointed to her mouth with one paw, while still using the other to keep her from falling back.

"OH, you want a seed. Right Penelope?" Penelope responded by nodding her head with her mouth still open and ready for a seed. Hamtaro leaned forward and grabbed a seed. He held out the seed in his paw towards Penelope. A few seconds passed before Penelope again pointed to her mouth and once again, Hamtaro caught on. "You... Want me to feed you?"

"Pleeeease!" she said excitedly, giving a few quick nods. "Feed!" she said to Hamtaro in a sort of pleading way. Hamtaro thought for a moment. He did think it was fairly cute that Penelope wanted to be fed sunflower seeds. He also still felt nice about being the one to be spoken to by Penelope. Hamtaro eagerly leaned over and gently slid the seed into Penelope's mouth. As soon as the seed was in, Penelope shut her mouth, ate the seed, and the next moment opened her mouth again. Hamtaro couldn't understand it. He actually enjoyed giving Penelope that seed. The happiness he gave her, making her cute little face bright with joy! Penelope opened her mouth a bit wider.

A-another?" hamtaro asked with a slight stammer. Yet again, Penelope nodded her head. As soon as she did, Hamtaro picked up another seed and slid it into her mouth. He watched as she quickly ate it with an expression of content and joy in her face. He was actually so happy for her that he felt a bit embarrassed. It showed on his face as a slight, red blush. Penelope noticed this and a small surge of excitement went through her. She loved the special attention she was getting from her special crush. Seeing Hamtaro actually blush made her feel even more love and hope for Hamtaro. Penelope opened her mouth as wide as she could. Hoping to gain more of Hamtaro's affection.
13321212.title: Hamtaro finally starts to actually feed Penelope!

choices: Hamtaro want to join his love in the joys of being fat
Peleope wants to get bigger to be even closer to Hamtaro!
133212121.content:
One after another, Hamtaro picked up seeds and fed them to Penelope. Penelope was enjoying eating all these seeds as much as she loved being close to Hamtaro! And Hamtaro loved feeding her just as much! The gigantic pile of seeds started to get smaller as Hamtaro fed her more. Hamtaro kept putting more seeds into Penelope's mouth and she just kept eating and eating, swallowing each seed slid into her mouth

After many of the pile's seeds had been fed to Penelope, Hamtaro reached for yet another. He grabbed it and leaned to put it into Penelope's mouth, but he lost balance and fell over. "Oof," Hamtaro let out as he landed. "Oops, guess I lost my balance." Hamtaro shook his head and looked over to Penelope. His arm was resting on her belly, which seemed a quite a lot bigger. In fact, her whole body had gotten a bit larger. She had stated to put on some fat from eating all those sunflower seeds and looked very plump."Oh sorry Penelope," Hamtaro apologized.

Penelope shook her head. "Mm mm." Penelope wrapped her arms around Hamtaro's arm and squeezed. "Hamtaro," she said softly. With Hamtaro's arm hugged against Penelope's now larger belly, he couldn't help but notice how soft and cushiony it was. It felt nice. She felt like a nice, comfy miniature bed. Hamtaro pressed his paw against her a bit more.

"Wow, Penelope! You're really soft!" Hamtaro complimented to her as he smiled to her. After hearing this, Penelope kept hugging his arm against her.
133212121.title: Penelope is starting to gain!

choices: He does think Penelope is pretty cute and wants to make her bigger and fatter!
Penelope wants make herself fatter for Hamtaro!
1332121212.content:
As the two sat in the shade, Penelope felt so wonderful to be so close to Hamtaro. She had Hamtaro's paw resting on her belly, and remembered how he'd said she felt 'soft'. Penelope wanted to be with him and she started to think that maybe if she got even softer, Hamtaro might want to be closer to her... Maybe he'd even want to cuddle up with her if she got big enough. She would get fatter and Hamtaro would want to snuggle her. A giggle came from Penelope at the thought of Hamtaro cuddling with her.

Hamtaro heard her giggle and meanwhile wondered if she was excited about the picnic. Or maybe she really did have some kind of crush on him, he wondered. Hamtaro looked at Penelope. Though her face was hidden behind her yellow cloth, he could still see her eyes looking at him with affection. Penelope even seemed to be somewhat cuter with this new pudge on her.
1332121212.title: Fatter and closer?

choices: Hamtaro finds more seeds for Penelope!
Hamtaro ends up finding something... different to fatten Penelope!
13321212121.content:
Hamtaro looked at Penelope again. She was smiling peacefully. Penelope leaned in a bit, causing Hamtaro's paw to slide a little across her belly. Noticing this, Hamtaro lifted his arm quickly and blushed vibrantly. Penelope noticed this and decided she'd continue to try and get Hamtaro to feed her the rest of the seeds. She laid back and opened her mouth, once again awaiting seeds. Hamtaro grabbed a couple seeds, saying "I'd love to feed you more seeds, Penelope!"

A flutter of joy spread through Penelope. She was so excited to hear him say 'love to'. She couldn't wait to be fed. She would get big and soft so Hamtaro would love her more! She opened her mouth wider as Hamtaro put a few seeds in. Penelope ate the seeds and re-opened her mouth like before. Hamtaro grabbed another handful of seeds and put them in her mouth. The seeds went down Penelope's throat, handful after handful. Each adding a very small amount of weight and fat to Penelope's body. But after many, many seeds, the affects could easily be seen as Penelope started to grow fat.

Finally, Hamtaro grabbed the last handfull of seeds and fed them to Penelope. She was now no longer just chubby. After eating every seed in the pile, she was now fat. Penelope was just a bit bigger than Hamtaro. Her body, thick with fat, was now much wider. The fat of Penelope had spread a little to her arms and legs, rounding them a little. Hamtaro looked at her large body and couldn't help but lay his arms down on her big belly. He just leaned and smiled at Penelope. "You sure have gotten big and soft, Penelope!" He rubbed her stomach a bit. "I didn't know you could be this cute!" After realizing what he'd said, Hamtaro's face turned red and he froze.

She knew it! Penelope knew that if she got fatter, Hamtaro would love her! She then recalled what she'd thought earlier: that if she got big enough, Hamtaro might even snuggle with her! Looking where the pile of seeds used to be Penelope asked "no more seeds?" Hamtaro's mind quickly snapped back to reality.

"Guess not..." he said sadly. "Don't worry I'll go find some more for you!" Hamtaro stood up straight. "Right, I'll be back in a bit Penelope!" With that, Hamtaro scurried off to find more seeds for Penelope!
13321212121.title: Fatter and closer!

choices: She gathers herself enough to give Hamtaro a kiss
She tries to get him to notice by acting as cute as she possibly could
133212121211.content:
Penelope sat for a while, thinking of how much she loved Hamtaro and how he always was so nice to everyone, making her feel even more for Hamtaro.. She couldn't wait until he returned as she restlessly sat there. Penelope kept daydreaming about Hamtaro until he returned a while later. She stood up with more difficulty than usual from her recently added weight. Again, Hamtaro was struggling to pull the wagon of sunflower seeds, which she didn't even notice he took until now. She also had to wonder where he kept getting all these seeds! As Hamtaro brought the wagon up to Penelope, her heart jumped. Penelope felt like she needed to show him she loved him with some gesture so clear and obvious, even oblivious Hamtaro would figure it out!

While Penelope stood there thinking, the wagon rolled up next to her, creaking under the heavy weight of the seeds. Once again, a pile of seeds was resting before her, ready to be eaten. "Hey, Penelope!" Hamtaro said excitedly and eager to feed Penelope even more. "Look at how many seeds I got!" Hamtaro walked to the other side of the wagon, and towards Penelope. He grabbed a seed with a warm smile on his face. "I sure hope you're still hungry!" Penelope nodded and laid down as Hamtaro brought the seed to her mouth. He put the seed into her mouth and she, of course, ate it. Once again the cycle had started. Hamtaro continued to shove the seeds into her mouth while she continued to swallow them. Her body started to grow again as she got even fatter. The seeds just kept coming and her weight continued to increase. Her limbs were going from thick and pudgy to large and heavy.

Penelope was gaining more weight and enjoying or even loving being fed by Hamtaro, but her mind was still circling around getting Hamtaro to notice her feelings and love her back. Hamtaro turned around to grab more to feed to Penelope. She went over these things in her head over and over again, but she felt so nervous and timid.
133212121211.title: Hamtaro is just so oblivious, isn't he?

1332121212111.content:
Penelope's cute routine wasn't going as planne, she was getting hot from the feeding frenzy.
Penelope was getting full, and bored of being fed by Hamtaro. Hamtaro was just about stuff some seeds into Penelope's mouth, suddenly Penelope stops Hamtaro from feeding her

"What's the matter Penelope" Hamtaro asks with his signature dumbfounded look

"I.." "I love you Hamtaro" Penelope says and hugs him, she then kisses him

.
1332121212111.title: She gathers herself enough to give Hamtaro a kiss

13321212121112.content: Hamtaro looked at her with a shocked expression, the words bouncing about in his brain. Suddenly, he bursts out in laughter, saying, "Nice one, Penelope. You had me going." At those words, Penelope...
13321212121112.title: Hamtaro thinks it's a joke

133212121211122.content:
"Huh, Hamtaro no love me?" Penelope, Hamtaro thinks about it "Hmmm?, nope" Penelope starts to cry. Hamtaro sits there thinking of feeding Penelope, Hamtaro grabs some seeds and puts them to Penelope's maw. Penelope wasn't by Hamtaro's side.

Penelope was on her cell phone "Pashmina, I need you." "Where are you hon.?" "I'm at the oak tree, sniff sniff." "Are you crying" "Just come get me Pash" "Ok hon"

Penelope wait for Pashmina to come, but she was taking longer than usual.
133212121211122.title: cried as her feelings were hurt.
